title: Adobe Flash Professional CC 2015 (v15.0) RUS-ENG {by M0nkrus}-=T
description:
Software Version: 2015.0.0 (15.0.0.173)
assembly Author : m0nkrus
Language: English / Russian
Treatment: complete
Type of medicine: keygen + patch

System requirements: - Intel Pentium 4, Intel Centrino, Intel Xeon or Intel Core Duo (or compatible)
- Microsoft Windows 7 x64 or x64 Windows 8.1
- 2 GB of RAM (4 GB) - 4 GB of free hard disk space for installation; additional free space required during installation (can not install on removable flash storage devices)
- Screen resolution of 1024 x 900 (recommended 1280 x 1024) - recommends QuickTime 7.7.x
- Internet connection and registration are required for access to online services

Description : Adobe Flash Professional CC 2015 - a powerful environment for creating animation and multimedia content. It allows you to create expressive interactive projects,
which are displayed in excellent quality on desktops and multiple devices, including tablets and smartphones, as well as on television.
Adobe Flash Professional CC 2015 also allows you to work with raster, vector and also with three-dimensional graphics using a GPU. It also supports bidirectional streaming of audio and video.
PDA and other mobile devices released a special "lite" version of the platform Flash Lite, functionality is limited to counting on the capabilities of mobile devices and operating systems Android,
iOS and others. Adobe Flash Professional CC 2015 is part of the Creative Cloud. Therefore, its users access to all the latest updates, and access to new versions available from the date of their issue.
Improve your skills and master new tools thanks to the large and ever-growing collection of instructional videos. Through integration with Behance can share their projects with other users and receive instant feedback on their work from designers from around the world.


List of changes
What changed me:

- From the original ESD-distribution, containing Russian and English languages, removed all other language packs.
- A number of the original files for patched installer replaced (cracked PAINTER ), so the opportunity to integrate the updates in the distribution.
- The distribution integrated update to Adobe Camera Raw to version 9.1.60.
- The distribution is integrated with the utility Adobe Update Managment Tool 8.0 (developed PAINTER ), which allows you to set the "cloud" update.
- In the folder Crack in the image are a set of tools and detailed instructions to register the Adobe Flash Professional CC 2015.
